message: Let's be fair, Bob. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor to start.
I think I deserve a bit more, 55/45 is still quite generous.
Bob, my offer is now 55/45.  It's the same split you wanted last round, but time is money! Let's make a deal.
I'll take a bit more, considering the inflation, 57.5/42.5 is my new offer.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous. I'm lowering my offer to 52/48.  Take it before inflation eats away at your potential gains even more!
